sentences.sContent: All but one of the deaths were in Mexico, the epicenter of the outbreak.
sentences.sContent_eng: All but one of the deaths were in Mexico, the epicenter of the outbreak.
sentences.sCn: 除一人外，其他死亡患者都在疾病爆发的中心地墨西哥。

sentences.sContent: Not only has the epicenter of the quake shifted, but, so far, the tremors have shaken markets differently.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not only has the epicenter of the quake shifted, but, so far, the tremors have shaken markets differently.
sentences.sCn: 不仅地震的震中发生了转移，而且迄今余震以不同的方式震撼了市场。

sentences.sContent: In an age of fad diets, where weight loss is society’s epicenter, and deprivation is the only way to achieve it, it’s a comfort to know that there is still room for small indulgences.
sentences.sContent_eng: In an age of fad diets, where weight loss is society’s epicenter, and deprivation is the only way to achieve it, it’s a comfort to know that there is still room for small indulgences.
sentences.sCn: 在一岁一下的时尚饮食中，哪里可以减轻体重哪里就是社会的震中，并且实现它，剥夺就是唯有出路。 知道这里还有余地小小的放任是很安慰的。

remMethod.val: epi(挨劈) + center(中心) → 土地挨劈的中心 → 震中
